title: Journey To Hololive
description: Help Aloe to leave the demonic realm and reach her goal of joining Hololive. It is a thorny path, but with your support she may just make it to the end.

title: Ma No Tomo
description: A 2D Puzzle Platformer with an exciting twist! Solve puzzles! Unlock amazing fanart! Challenge yourself and finish the game within the fastest possible time!

title: ManoSnek
description: The classic Snake, with bonus features and more succubi. Collect as many manotomo as you can, and protect yourself from devilish fireballs with the power of music!

title: Aloe's Bento Shop
description: Help Aloe serve as many tasty bento boxes as you can in Aloe's Bento Shop!
